laboratory_examinations.findings: Several fluid collections observed, the largest in the deep pelvis anterior to the rectum. Post-procedure CT showed marked interval collapse in the size of the collection, a moderate-sized hematoma in the right piriformis muscle measuring approximately 6.1 x 9.3 cm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Post-procedure CT demonstrated no change in the size of the hematoma.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 1+ polymorphonuclear leukocytes (<1 per 1000X FIELD); no microorganisms seen.
